name: lenegd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c0))))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c0))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c0))))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))

comment: Negative of both sides of 'less than or equal to'. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
